body:
I actually got it to work using a Type.ps1xml

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<Types>
  <Type>
    <Name>Depute</Name>
    <Members>

      <ScriptProperty>
        <Name>Groupe</Name>
        <GetScriptBlock>
          $this.IdentitePolitique.Groupe
        </GetScriptBlock>
      </ScriptProperty>
      <ScriptProperty>
        <Name>NomCirconscription</Name>
        <GetScriptBlock>
          $this.IdentitePolitique.NomCirconscription
        </GetScriptBlock>
      </ScriptProperty>
      <ScriptProperty>
        <Name>PlaceHemicylce</Name>
        <GetScriptBlock>
          $this.IdentitePolitique.PlaceHemicylce
        </GetScriptBlock>
      </ScriptProperty>
      <ScriptProperty>
        <Name>Collaborateurs</Name>
        <GetScriptBlock>
          $this.IdentitePolitique.Collaborateurs
        </GetScriptBlock>
      </ScriptProperty>

    <ScriptProperty>
        <Name>Twitter</Name>
        <GetScriptBlock>
          $this.contact.twitter
        </GetScriptBlock>
      </ScriptProperty>

      <ScriptProperty>
        <Name>Email</Name>
        <GetScriptBlock>
          $this.contact.Email
        </GetScriptBlock>
      </ScriptProperty>

      <ScriptProperty>
        <Name>Siteweb</Name>
        <GetScriptBlock>
          $this.contact.Siteweb
        </GetScriptBlock>
      </ScriptProperty>

    <ScriptProperty>
        <Name>NombreAutreMandats</Name>
        <GetScriptBlock>
          $this.autresmandats.count
        </GetScriptBlock>
      </ScriptProperty>

    </Members>
  </Type>
</Types>
```

Resulted in:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6302961/40570520-ff91b18c-608b-11e8-9687-5dc31a973c56.png)
